levelList.name: Ordine: Collasso
levelList.desc:
If the main target has [Combustion] or [Burst], Final Power +1
[BeforeAttack] Deal +1% damage for every 1 ([Burst] Potency + [Burst] Count) on the main target (max 15%)
[EndSkill] Gain 4 [CuredFilm]
[EndSkill] Heal self and 1 ally with the least HP percentage by 15% of this unit's max HP
- If this unit is at max HP, heal 2 other allies instead
[EndSkill] Heal 10 SP for 2 allies, including this unit, with the lowest SP

levelList.name: Ordine: Collasso
levelList.desc:

<style="highlight">- If this unit has [CuredFilm], multiply this effect and its maximum cap by 1.5</style>
[EndSkill] Gain <style="highlight">7</style> [CuredFilm]
[EndSkill] Heal self and 1 ally with the least HP percentage by <style="highlight">20</style>% of this unit's max HP
- If this unit is at max HP, heal 2 other allies instead
[EndSkill] Heal 10 SP for 2 allies, including this unit, with the lowest SP

- If this unit is at max HP, heal 2 other allies instead
[EndSkill] Heal <style="highlight">15</style> SP for 2 allies, including this unit, with the lowest SP
